<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update a contact point</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v1/provisioning/contact-points/{UID}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Update a contact point. 
Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.


## Request
